name: nEon (itch) (WiseBart)
description:
My entry for the Amaze Me Game Jam

I overscoped quite a bit so the gameplay is lacking and the game cannot be finished. Two to three weeks seemed like forever, yet passed as if it were nothing.
I hope you'll enjoy the introduction, the tiny bit of gameplay there is and otherwise that you might be "amazed" by the game world. A large amount of time was spent on that alone.

There is not much of a true ending but if you return to the downtown area by metro after restoring the power in Hub Control the characters will all say something else.

How to start the game

Step into the train cart and push it forward until it starts moving out of its own. Fasten seatbelt if desired by pressing E to lock yourself to the cart (the same for the metro).

A tiny warning in advance: this game has some flickering visuals in it during part of the game.

Controls

Mouse: Look around/rotate
E: Interact
Space: Change element (visual style and visibility)
WASD/ZQSD: Move, push train cart
M: Toggle WASD/ZQSD
Left mouse button: shoot/weld (on boards)

Credits

Everything in this entry was made by me, Bart, during the jam period, except for the following sound effects: electric arc effect, weld effect, horn effect and restore power effect. These were taken from zapsplat.com
Music created with LMMS. Additional sound effects recorded and modified using Audacity.
The Mgmt District background tune was modified from an existing melody that I already created before.
3D models were all done in Blender and exported using my set of Blender exporters.
Additional fonts used in the game: Automania, Bellerose, Chunkfive, Coventry Garden, Flottflott, Hello Denver, Monoton, Parklane, Picadilly, Rationale, Tonight, Mama
